titles.title: To extend the grace period for personal watercraft use in Lake Roosevelt National Recreation Area.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks, Recreation and Public Lands.

committee.subcommittee: National Parks, Recreation, and Public Lands
committee.name: House Resources

bill.summary: 11/21/2003--Introduced. Extends the grace period for personal watercraft use in Lake Roosevelt National Recreation Area to December 31, 2004.
